trans-unit.source: In this section you will use Visual Studio to host the mobile service locally on your development workstation in IIS Express.
trans-unit.target: In this section you will use Visual Studio to host the mobile service locally on your development workstation in IIS Express.

trans-unit.source: Then you will test the app and the backend service.
trans-unit.target: Then you will test the app and the backend service.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the F7 key or click **Build Solution** from the **Build** menu to build both the Windows Store app and the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the F7 key or click **Build Solution** from the **Build** menu to build both the Windows Store app and the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Verify both projects build with no errors in the output window of Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Verify both projects build with no errors in the output window of Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key or click **Start Debugging** from the **Debug** menu to run the app and host the mobile service locally in IIS Express.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key or click **Start Debugging** from the **Debug** menu to run the app and host the mobile service locally in IIS Express.

trans-unit.source: This inserts a new todoItem in the database created by the mobile service hosted locally in IIS Express.
trans-unit.target: This inserts a new todoItem in the database created by the mobile service hosted locally in IIS Express.

trans-unit.source: Click the checkbox for one of the items to mark it as completed.
trans-unit.target: Click the checkbox for one of the items to mark it as completed.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio you can view the changes in the database created for the backend service by opening Server Explorer and expanding the Data Connections.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio you can view the changes in the database created for the backend service by opening Server Explorer and expanding the Data Connections.

trans-unit.source: Right click the TodoItems table under **MS_TableConnectionString** and click **Show Table Data**
trans-unit.target: Right click the TodoItems table under **MS_TableConnectionString** and click **Show Table Data**
